title: Lonewalker
description: Ben Tails, a former Marine Corps sniper in Vietnam, finds himself in Japan, where he ultimately discovers that he is a pawn in a larger power struggle, between forces that he has no real understanding of. To survive, he must enlist the help of his wartime alter ego, Mr. Slide. Graphic violence, penetrating and incisive analysis of complex cultural and historical events, and one man's heroic defiance make this a novel that will stay with readers long after they have closed the book.
author: Gary J.  Cook
